resources.string: To use Share your Settings install Google Play Services
Use map service to obfuscate your location.
Anonymously share your settings with others in the crowd.
Display most often used setting from the crowd to support own selection.
Do you really want to reset all location privacy settings to factory defaults?
Host Address for the crowd webservice
Either show stars or show text in the dialog as recommendation.
Maximum of random value added to real location for street-level obfuscation
Maximum of random value added to real location for district-level obfuscation
Maximum of random value added to real location for city-level obfuscation
Visually setup values using a map of a representative city
Minimum of random value added to real location

If online service is allowed and used, an app gets the location of the center of the street, district or city next to your real location. In offline mode, a random value in configured range is added to real location.

The advantage of the online mode is a dynamic obfuscation depend on where you actually are. However, the geo webservice of Google gets to know where you are while others do not. The offline mode keeps your real location on the device, but you have to set up the boundaries for random values added to real location.
Location access in the last 28 days
Location access in the last 24 hours
wants to use to your current location. How imprecise should it be?

Please choose the allowed accurancy of location access. This window will show again when the app tries to access your location the next time. Until making your choice the app will get no access to your location.
An error has occured when retrieving recommendations. Maybe you are not connected to the Internet.
The more stars an option has, the more people chose that option.
No recommendation available for this app.
One or more Apps have no location privacy settings
Please specify the minimal distance you want to ensure being between your real and the obfuscate location when using street, district or city-level obfuscation.
Please search for a representative city you might often stay at.
Select a location near city boundaries by clicking on the map.
Imagine you are the red point in the midle of the map. Please select a location as far away from you as you would think this is still in your district/village.
You are in the middle of the street. Please select the end of the street. If the street is very short or very long pick a place somewhere after or before its end.
The city was not found. Please choose another one.
An error has occured. Please check your Internet connection.
These settings were calculated based on your selections. You may re-run the wizard (with another city) or manually change values if you do not agree with them.
An error occured. Please check the webservice URL and your Internet connection.
Webservice supports sharing your settings with others only. It provides no recommendations by others.
Webservice neither supports recommendations by others nor sharing your settings with others.
Webservice supports recommendations by others only. It does not allow sharing your settings with others.
Webservice supports recommendations by others and sharing your settings with others.
Use mean deviation from past online obfuscation.
Do you want to use the following values?
